short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cozy up Chrome with a Christmas Tree by the Fireplace animated wallpaper, plus a search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cozy up Chrome with a Christmas Tree by the Fireplace animated wallpaper, plus a search bar and quick-access icons for festive browsing.

Transform your browser into a warm holiday haven with the Christmas Tree Fireplace Animated Wallpaper Chrome extension! Each new tab reveals a cozy, animated scene of a beautifully decorated Christmas tree beside a softly crackling fireplace. Perfect for anyone who loves the warmth and joy of the holiday season, these live wallpapers bring festive cheer and a touch of magic to your browsing experience.
Alongside the inviting visuals, this extension includes a Google search bar for easy browsing and customizable quick-access icons for your favorite sites. This combination of function and festive decor keeps you connected while wrapping your browser in the spirit of Christmas.
Ideal for holiday enthusiasts, this Christmas Tree Fireplace Animated Wallpaper extension adds seasonal warmth to every new tab. Enjoy the soft glow and peaceful ambiance of Christmas, making each online session a festive escape during the holiday season!
